name: Launch Stars Demo
description:
This is a very brief demo of my Launch Stars project, an attempt to bridge the Mario series with Star Wars and tie the two icons together with the RPG elements of both the Paper Mario series and Deltarune.

The demo contains a multifaceted cave area, two fully-programmed cutscenes, a regular battle, and a tutorial battle.

CONTROLS:

  • Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move.
  • Press Z to Jump and Attack.
  • Press X to cancel.
